examples.description: Given a UK Limited Company which was started on 2014-01-01 -> And a staging date of 2015-04-06 -> And they are running payroll in the 2016 tax year on the 25th of each month -> Given a Employee payroll profile with NI letter A -> And they are paid £1000 monthly -> When they run payroll for a period -> Then the qualifying earnings on the payslip should be £514 -> And they could be eligible for auto-enrolment
